name: Winter Cabin
description: "In the midst of a cold, wintry forest, Bob Ross gently places a magical little wooden shanty upon a bed of soft snow."

name: Secluded Lake
description: "With brush in hand, Bob Ross leads you on a summertime nature walk, as you uncover the beauty of leafy trees and pond."

name: Evergreens At Sunset
description: "Using a different technique or two, Bob Ross creates a fascinating scene – watch the sun drop below the horizon, just behind the shadow of trees."

name: Mountain Cabin
description: "To capture the innocence of a stream-side cottage, Bob Ross creates a giant mountain standing majestically in the distance."

name: Portrait of Sally
description: "Visiting artist, Ben Stahl, uses a more traditional painting method to bring out the coy loveliness of a little girl."

name: Misty Waterfall
description: "Bob Ross helps a timid little stream find its way to a delightful waterfall, while gazing upon a forest of elegant trees."

name: Barn At Sunset
description: "Bob Ross paints an expansive barn appearing half-covered in a snowy setting of frost bitten foliage and sun-kissed sky."

name: Mountain Splendor
description: It’s almost fall, and Bob Ross captures the undaunted power and charm of a mighty brown mountain surveying its rustic surroundings.

name: Lake By Mountain
description: Talented guest painter Steve Ross shows you how to create a mirror-like lake spanning the width of snowy peaks and foothills.

name: Mountain Glory
description: Layers and layers of mountains, as far as the eye can see -- Bob Ross shows us the secret to creating a larger-than-life landscape.

name: Grey Winter
description: Bob Ross uses monochromatic tones to convey the icy coldness of a silvery lake surrounded by lacy trees and bushes – brr!

name: Dock Scene
description: An abandoned shipping boat hugs a pier in a water scene that Bob Ross completes with some charming old dockside storage sheds.

name: Dark Waterfall
description: Watch Bob Ross create a sweet little waterfall in the middle of a protective forest of glorious early autumn foliage.
